title: Australasian Landforms (Captioned)
brief_description: This documentary shows the evolution of Australia, New Guinea and New Zealand over the last 2,000 million years ago. Animation is combined with aerial footage of the four main landform regions: The Western Shield, Central Basin, Eastern Highlands and the Island Arc from New Guinea to New Zealand.
